data.title: Solid Choice for Standard Fare
data.text: Don't expect fancy, but the dinner meals are respectable and if you work with the help you'll get what you want.  I don't dine in and I don't order in advance.  I'm always a walk up and watch as they pull together my order and any special requests.  The roast turkey is good and they make a decent salad.  Meat loaf is also respectable as is the half a chicken.  All in all you get a decent value.

data.title: Missing items and poor quality
data.text: Ordered food for the family and went to pick it up. Timing was slow, but this seems to be usual at this location. Got home and opened my pot pie and found no cornbread, then while eating it found a 4" bone in it. Bit into it but luckily it didnt stick me. They make a pretty hardy pot pie, but apparently quality control is not part of the program.

data.title: Can't put lipstick on a pig
data.text: This restaurant was recently remodeled and looks nice inside. Well that is where the nice looks end. Ordering was slow, took several times to get delivered orders correct as the server would drop off food and ignore your asking for items until the next time she dropped off food. One dish had a hair and where we sat, you could watch the preparer pick his teeth over the food. This is a place we used to frequent a lot but looks like this will be our last.
